titleStmt.title: The moste excellent and pleasaunt booke, entituled: The treasurie of Amadis of Fraunce conteyning eloquente orations, pythie epistles, learned letters, and feruent complayntes, seruing for sundrie purposes. ... Translated out of Frenche into English.
Amadís de Gaula (Spanish romance). Book 2. English.
titleStmt.author: Paynell, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Bynneman, for Thomas Hacket. And are to be solde at his shoppe in the Royall Exchaunge. at the signe of the greene Dragon,

notesStmt.note: A selection translated by Thomas Paynell from "Le tresor de Amadis", in turn a selection from books 1-13 of Nicolas de Herberay's translation of "Amadis de Gaula".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe in the Royall Exchaunge. at the signe of the greene Dragon
